h2_title: Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: When at last the Mad Tiger falls before you, he’ll release his Mad Tiger Spirit for you to absorb, and drop a Blood of the Iron Bull, Yaoguai Core, Stone Spirit, and 1,023 Will. Be sure to also search the bottom of the well carefully, and you can find a large wooden chest that holds the Plaguebane Gourd!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When at last the Mad Tiger falls before you, he’ll release his Mad Tiger Spirit for you to absorb, and drop a Blood of the Iron Bull, Yaoguai Core, Stone Spirit, and 1,023 Will. Be sure to also search the bottom of the well carefully, and you can find a large wooden chest that holds the Plaguebane Gourd!
